data.name: Facebook – remove ads in feed
data.description:
Removes ads in main feed.
Almost all – some ads are indistinguishable in source code (I'm sorry).

data.name: Geocaching.com Hide Disclaimer
data.description:
Hide the disclaimer text on the cache and print-friendly pages.

Note: To use this user style, and the services of geocaching.com, you must agree to the terms and conditions in Groundspeak's disclaimer. http://www.geocaching.com/about/disclaimer.aspx
In other words, hiding the disclaimer does not negate it.

data.name: Multi-Column Mastodon Streams
data.description:
Browse Mastodon faster with Multi-column streams! The 2nd and 4th columns are expanded very wide, so the page ends up about twice as wide as the browser.

You "flip" between the left and right halves of the page to browse your Home stream or a selected Stream/user/search

data.name: Toss a coin to your developper, Oh valley Role 20
data.description: A desperate attempt to improve the style of the Role 20 editor, including dark mode. No miracles were made, as I am not (yet) able to revive the dead.

data.name: My Dark SecondLife
data.description: This style was created to darken the appearance of the marketplace and the web profiles. When it's late at night, I find opening the marketplace to be very aggressive to my eyes. [ Version: 24 | View change logs ]

user.name: Hyokkuda
user.about: I am a hardcore gamer, completionist, creative & perfectionist. I like various anime in the style of Dragon Ball Z, Bleach & Sword Art Online. I love spicy food & vanilla stuff! Also I'm a web stylist. I started off on a community website called Gaia Online with CSS and CSS3 style language. I continued working on websites and designs and now here I am. I am trying to make a living on making websites and web styles like theses. I do not force anyone on donating, but it is most appreciated. ♥

data.name: Amazon - Dark Theme
data.description:
A dark theme for Amazon.  Colors are adjustable via the variables set on :root.

Style was derived from #133725.  Updated for better compatibility and usage of variables rather than just colors.

Any issues?  Additional websites to add?  Want to check out my other dark theme styles?  Let me know by contacting me through my social media (and please provide a screenshot if possible): https://www.queengoob.org/darkthemes

data.name: Archlinux.org Dark mode (WIP)
data.description: A dark mode for the archlinux website. Should work perfectly on the wiki pages and sort of work on the forum pages.

data.name: Dark Nookazon
data.description: Makes Nookazon.com a a little easier on the eyes in the dark.
